channel.title: Losing all Items

item.title: Losing all Items
item.dc:creator: @huiho huiho
item.description:
@huiho wrote:

[quote=“Oh-Noes, post:3, topic:339038”]Remove:

youdied();

It’s a void used when a player dies. Not sure why it’s in your destruct method, but it shouldn’t be.[/quote]

Thanks! It came with the base… I wasn’t sure if I should remove it or not… But now i know thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Losing all Items
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Remove:

youdied();

It’s a void used when a player dies. Not sure why it’s in your destruct method, but it shouldn’t be.

Read full topic

item.title: Losing all Items
item.dc:creator: @flyer flyer
item.description:
@flyer wrote:

public void destruct() { client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; if (disconnected && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) && inCombat) { youdied(); savegame(false); }

try changing the savegane(false);
to true

public void destruct() { client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; if (disconnected && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) && inCombat) { youdied(); savegame(true); }

Read full topic

item.title: Losing all Items
item.dc:creator: @huiho huiho
item.description:
@huiho wrote:

I need help… When someone logsout in wilderness they lose all their stuff… How do i change it?

[code]public void destruct() {
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
if (disconnected && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) && inCombat)
{

youdied();
savegame(false);
}[/code]

Read full topic
